post.body: I will bring your copy to the post office today :-)
ha ha, yeah!
hello :-)
http://bit.ly/10yig

wishing you a good day anyway. try to do something that brings energy back
we will :-)
heading to leon, spain, to play at purpleweekend.com
leon, spain
:-) haha
thanks! We're gonna have fun!
yeah! We played a high enery show! We got people to dance at lunchtime :-) :-)
we play steam powered garage pop!
don't know about economy but people buy cd's and shirts like crazy
thank you
ha ha, nice. You a poet?
Ode to Joy is a fantastic album by a band called "The Deadly Snakes"
ha ha, Glockenspiel. Yeah I know a good Powerpop Band using Glockenspiel. The Caesars :-)
we have both. Cowbell and Tambourine. Love em both :-)
ha ha, Lili usually bangs the cowbell, but you could join her on stage. That's the cowbell I'm talkin about: http://bit.ly/DQ5v
Really hope you can make it happen. Would love to get to know you in person. And yeah, we would rock out together
Thanks. We look forward to playing!
Don't know if I already asked. Will you bet at SXSW? That would be nice for cocktail too :-)
ok, I've never been, but would love to go once.
band shirts for 3.95. Mhh are they any good?
thanks :-) Back in full force. Good morning
hello :-)
thanks alot!
Good too! Just played in Spain last weekend. Next weekend Italy. Rockin' December :-) Yeah please: http://bit.ly/38SA
Yeah I know, I don't know who fucked this up.
ha ha, yeah use coffee for that. What do you use soap for then?
ganz grosse Klasse, da hast du recht
we are going :-)
get yourself a new one
Would love to. It's a bit too far away though
www.myspace.com/choochootheband
have a nice day anyway :-)
friday night was ok, last night in La Spezia was a blast
no crew yet. DIY!
You're welcome
yeah, they did. Taking a rest now. Gigs start again mid January
Those guys won: http://bit.ly/T1Dd
We will! Thanks!
ok, thank YOU!
thank you!
yeah, of course. Try iTunes: http://bit.ly/OT5k Let me know if you find us :-)
there's 8 other bands beside CHOO CHOO
still cool to hear our songs on the radio.! Tonight is Swiss Top decision. National radio is naming swiss newcomer of the year
Good morning world
Killed hunger with quick spaghetti. Now music!
Quick dinner with lili then off to rehearsing
Listening to "Hederos and Hellberg" doing their version of the STooges classic "no fun"

We are all really hungry!
Just met our driver fadil. Now heading to leon where the festival is. 3 hours drive
At baggage claim

rehearsing getting closer! Yeah, in a rockin' mood

need lunch now
Just put all our stuff back in the rehearsal room. Now heading home
1 hour and we're back home in Bern.

Cappuccio!
Last pitstop in Italy, near the swiss border
just had breakfast, about to leave Diego's Castle (literally, that guy lives in a castle) and head back to Switzerland
good morning world
It's 3.50 now
Heading to Diego's place, where we will crash
Still dancing! This was the last CHOO CHOO show in 2008!
Was a great show. It' 2.45 and we 're dancing to born to be wild by steppenwolve
World that is :-) Still a little sleepy
